author: E_P_the_one
title: Superb
text:
We had a wonderful experience, although our flight to JFK was cancelled the front office manager Mr Schein assured us anything was OK he postponed our week stay for a day, the Suite was great - spacious large coat closet at the living room as well as a big closet in the bedroom, plenty of drawers, big size bed, a day bed, small kitchenette with mini bar items, small fridge, microwave coffee maker along with complimentary coffee and tea, four mags, dining set for 2.
bathtub was a jacuzzi (we did not tried it) good flow of hot water Bath amenities by "Penhaligon's" London felt very luxurious.
Service - very good from smiling front desk personnel through lovely attending bellboys/concierges (got us good price show tickets) and efficient housekeepers.
Room and hotel in large were very clean.
Breakfast had a variety of bagels, muffins, cakes etc (some yoghurts) it was included in the price with no extra cost, I do recommend to upgrade the toaster to a rolling one.
I heard there is a Gym but didn't have the time to explore it.
Location - can't get much better than that.
I do highly recommend
